item.title: Sharp Spectral Gap Estimates on Manifolds under Integral Ricci Curvature Bounds
item.description: arXiv:2510.27083v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We prove sharp spectral gap estimates on compact manifolds with integral curvature bounds. We generalize the results of Kr\"oger (Kr\"oger '92) as well as of Bakry and Qian (Bakry-Qian '00) to the case of integral curvature and confirm the conjecture in (Ramos et al. '20) for the case $n \geq 3$.
item.dc:creator: Xavier Ramos Oliv\'e, Shoo Seto, Malik Tuerkoen
